Class AirlineManageSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zyablov.airlinecompany.tools.AirlineManageSystem

  • public class AirlineManageSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class AirlineManageSystem manages the AirlineCompany object.
    Since:
    2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Дмитрий
    See Also:
    AirlineCompany

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAircraft(Aircraft newAircraft)
      This method adds a new Aircraft object to AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany addAircraftToPark() method.
      Aircraft getAircraftkById(int idAircraft)
      This method returns an Aircraft object from AircraftPark by it's unique id, using getAircraftFormAircraftParkById() method of AirlineCompany class.
      int getAircraftsTotalAmount()
      This method returns an amount of Aircraft objects in AircraftPark container, using getTotalAmountOfAircraft() method of AirlineCompany class.
      AirlineCompany getAirlineCompany() 
      java.lang.String getFullAirlineCompanyInformation()
      This method returns a full information about a AirlineCompany object to string, using AirlineCompany methods.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfAicrafts()
      This method returns a list of all Aircraft objects AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany getListOfAircrafts() method.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfFoundAircraftsByFuelSpendingRange(FuelSpendTonPerKm fromValueFuelSpending, FuelSpendTonPerKm toValueFuelSpending)
      This method returns a list of Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container which fuel spending parameter are included in the range formed by values fromValueFuelSpending and toValueFuelSpending, using AirlineCompany getListOfFoundAicraftsByFuelSpendingRange() method.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfFoundAircraftsByMidVelocityRange(KilometerPerHour fromValueMidVelocity, KilometerPerHour toValueMidVelocity)
      This method returns a list of Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container which middle velocity parameter are included in the range formed by values fromValueMidVelocity and toValueMidVelocity, using AirlineCompany getListOfFoundAicraftsByMidVelocityRange() method.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfSortAicraftByFuelSpending()
      This method returns a list of sort Aircraft objects by their fuel spending from AircraftPark container, using getListOfSortedAircraftByFuelSpending() method of AirlineCompany class.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfSortAicraftByMaxWeightCapacity()
      This method returns a list of sort Aircraft objects by their maximum weight capacity from AircraftPark container, using getListOfSortedAircraftByMaxWeightCapacity() method of AirlineCompany class.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfSortAircraftByPeopleCapacity()
      This method returns a list of sort Aircraft objects by their maximum people capacity from AircraftPark container, using getListOfSortedAircraftByPeopleCapacity() method of AirlineCompany class.
      java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfSortAircraftsByMiddleVelocity()
      This method returns a list of sort Aircraft objects by their middle velocity from AircraftPark container, using getListOfSortedAircraftsByMiddleVelocity() method of AirlineCompany class.
      PeopleCapacity getTotalAircraftsPeopleCapacity()
      This method reaturns a total amount of people capacity of all Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container, using getTotalAircraftsPeopleCapacity() method of AirlineCompany class.
      Tons getTotalAircraftsWeigthCapacity()
      This method reaturns a total amount of maximum weight capacity of all Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container, using getTotalAircraftsWeightCapacity() method of AirlineCompany class.
      boolean haveAirlinerCompany()
      This method returns true if airline company object was created else return false

      This method reads all Aircraft objects to AircraftPark container from file, using readAircraftListFromFile of FileAircraftsReaderable interface.

      This method removes existing a Aircraft object from AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany removeAircraftFromPark() method.

    • Method Detail

      • haveAirlinerCompany

        public boolean haveAirlinerCompany()
        This method returns true if airline company object was created else return false
        Returns:
        true if airlineCompany is initialized; false otherwise.

      • addAircraft

        public boolean addAircraft(Aircraft newAircraft)
                    throws NoAirlineCompanyException
        This method adds a new Aircraft object to AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany addAircraftToPark() method.
        Parameters:
        newAircraft - - is a Aircraft object to add to a AircraftPark container.
        Returns:
        true if an Aircraft object is added successfully; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException

      • removeAircraft

        public boolean removeAircraft(Aircraft removingAircraft)
                       throws NoAirlineCompanyException
        This method removes existing a Aircraft object from AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany removeAircraftFromPark() method.
        Parameters:
        removingAircraft - - is a Aircraft object to remove form a AircraftPark container.
        Returns:
        true if an Aircraft object is removed successfully; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException

      • getListOfAicrafts

        public java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfAicrafts()
                                           throws NoAirlineCompanyException,
                                                  AircraftEmptyParkException
        This method returns a list of all Aircraft objects AircraftPark container, using AirlineCompany getListOfAircrafts() method.
        Returns:
        a list of Aircraft objects.
        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException
        AircraftEmptyParkException

      • getListOfFoundAircraftsByMidVelocityRange

        public java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfFoundAircraftsByMidVelocityRange(KilometerPerHour fromValueMidVelocity,
                                                                          KilometerPerHour toValueMidVelocity)
                                                                   throws NoAirlineCompanyException,
                                                                          AircraftEmptyParkException
        This method returns a list of Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container which middle velocity parameter are included in the range formed by values fromValueMidVelocity and toValueMidVelocity, using AirlineCompany getListOfFoundAicraftsByMidVelocityRange() method.
        Parameters:
        fromValueMidVelocity - - a minumum KilometerPerHour value of the range
        toValueMidVelocity - - a maximum KilometerPerHour value of the range
        Returns:
        a list of Aircraft objects.
        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException
        AircraftEmptyParkException

      • getListOfFoundAircraftsByFuelSpendingRange

        public java.util.List<Aircraft> getListOfFoundAircraftsByFuelSpendingRange(FuelSpendTonPerKm fromValueFuelSpending,
                                                                           FuelSpendTonPerKm toValueFuelSpending)
                                                                    throws NoAirlineCompanyException,
                                                                           AircraftEmptyParkException
        This method returns a list of Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container which fuel spending parameter are included in the range formed by values fromValueFuelSpending and toValueFuelSpending, using AirlineCompany getListOfFoundAicraftsByFuelSpendingRange() method.
        Parameters:
        fromValueFuelSpending - - a minumum FuelSpendTonPerKm
        toValueFuelSpending - - a maximum FuelSpendTonPerKm value of the range
        Returns:
        a list of Aircraft objects.
        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException
        AircraftEmptyParkException

      • saveAircraftsToFile

        public void saveAircraftsToFile()
                         throws NoAirlineCompanyException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                AircraftEmptyParkException
        This method saves all Aircraft objects from AircraftPark container to file, using writeAircraftListToFile of FileAircraftsWriterable interface.

        Also this method uses a writeAircraftListToFile method of FileAicraftsSerializeWriter class to write information to data file about Aircraft objects.

        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException
        AircraftEmptyParkException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        FileAircraftsWriterable, FileAicraftsSerializeWriter

      • readAircraftsFromFile

        public void readAircraftsFromFile()
                           throws NoAirlineCompanyException,
                                  java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  EmptyAircraftsFileException
        This method reads all Aircraft objects to AircraftPark container from file, using readAircraftListFromFile of FileAircraftsReaderable interface.

        Also this method uses a readAircraftListFromFile method of FileAicraftsSerializeReader class to read information from data file about Aircraft objects.

        Throws:
        NoAirlineCompanyException
        AircraftEmptyParkException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        EmptyAircraftsFileException
        See Also:
        FileAircraftsReaderable, FileAicraftsSerializeReader
